name: PrimeSpectrum.instNoetherianSpace
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsNoetherianRing R
⊢ TopologicalSpace.NoetherianSpace (PrimeSpectrum R)
decl:
instance : NoetherianSpace (PrimeSpectrum R) :=
  ((noetherianSpace_TFAE <| PrimeSpectrum R).out 0 1).mpr (closedsEmbedding R).dual.wellFoundedLT

name: minimalPrimes.finite_of_isNoetherianRing
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsNoetherianRing R
⊢ (minimalPrimes R).Finite

name: PrimeSpectrum.finite_setOf_isMin
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsNoetherianRing R
⊢ (setOf fun x => IsMin x).Finite
decl:
lemma finite_setOf_isMin :
    {x : PrimeSpectrum R | IsMin x }.Finite := by
  have : Function.Injective (asIdeal (R := R)) := @PrimeSpectrum.ext _ _
  refine Set.Finite.of_finite_image (f := asIdeal) ?_ this.injOn
  simp_rw [isMin_iff]
  exact (minimalPrimes.finite_of_isNoetherianRing R).subset (Set.image_preimage_subset _ _)

name: PrimeSpectrum.instDiscreteTopology
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsArtinianRing R
⊢ DiscreteTopology (PrimeSpectrum R)
